description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for managing resources such as doctors, nurses, rooms, and devices within a surgical schedule management system. It sets up API endpoints with associated Swagger documentation.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles listing resources of a specific type.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles retrieving a specific resource by ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles creating a new resource of a specific type.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles updating an existing resource by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles deleting a resource by ID.

methods.name: updateDeviceStatus
methods.description: Handles updating the status of a device by ID.
